name: Futanari Sex - The Gym
description:
About the game
An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of a sexy futanari personal trainer taking the training of her sweet and oldest friend to another level…
Visual Novel Description
It’s Friday evening, and Juliet Jones had an excruciating long day at work.
Her new gym – “ JULIE’S FLEX APPEAL ” is getting more crowded with each passing day. Clients are happy, business is booming…her biggest dream is finally coming to life.
The days are getting longer, and they keep adding up, so the last thing she wants at the end of a full week is to train another client.
But this is Daisy Walker – not only the girl who pushed Juliet into getting that loan and opening her dream gym, but also the one who pushed every single one of her buttons before she disappeared from the face of the Earth.
The hot futanari trainer was left behind sick with lust, and heartbroken.
After years of absence, Daisy called at the gym and asked for Juliet to train her, no matter the cost.
That gives Juliet the perfect opportunity to get back at her.
NAKED training, or NO training – This is the only offer Juliet is willing to make.
Will Daisy agree to Juliet’s terms and take her training to the next level?
Follow the story and find out…
